attributes.action: set up a national Parking Place Register and make it illegal to (a) own a vehicle without an associated parking place, and (b) park in place owned by someone else without their permission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many people are stealing other people's parking places, presumably in order to avoid the expense of moving to a larger house with more parking places.

This form of stealing should not be tolerated.

A national Parking Place Register should be set up and a law created to make it illegal to (a) own a vehicle without an associated parking place, and (b) park in a place owned by someone else without their permission.

The punishment for violating part (a) of this law would be mandatory crushing of the vehicle in question.

The punishment for violating part (b) of the law would be a £100 fine for each offence.
